home.tagline: Aapka private, AI-powered wellness saathi jo yuva logon ke liye design kiya gaya hai. Chahe aapko baat karne ke liye ek surakshit jagah chahiye, apne mann ko shaant karne ke liye tools, ya gratitude practice karne ke liye ek jagah, Aarambh.AI aapki shaant, swasth mann ki yatra mein aapka samarthan karne ke liye yahan hai.
home.offerSubtitle: Turant, sulabh, aur private mansik swasthya sahayata pradan karne ke liye design kiye gaye tools ka ek suite.
home.footer: Aap akele nahi hain. Sahayata hamesha uplabdh hai.

default.name: Standard Calm Breathing
default.description: Shuru karne ke liye ek saral technique: 4s andar, 7s rokein, 8s bahar. Aapke nervous system ko shaant karne mein madad karta hai.

box.name: Box Breathing
box.description: Ise four-square breathing bhi kaha jata hai. 4s ke liye saans lein, 4s ke liye rokein, 4s ke liye saans chhodein, 4s ke liye rokein. Focus ke liye behtareen.

4-7-8.name: 4-7-8 Breathing
4-7-8.description: 4s ke liye saans lein, 7s ke liye rokein, phir 8s ke liye ek lambi saans chhodein. Relaxation aur neend ke liye ek shaktishali technique.

chat.initialMessage: Namaste! Main Aarambh hoon, aapka AI wellness saathi. Aaj aap kaisa mehsoos kar rahe hain? Aap mujhse apne mann ki koi bhi baat kar sakte hain.
chat.errorMessage: Maaf kijiye, mujhe connect karne mein samasya ho rahi hai. Kripya baad mein phir se prayas karen.

crisis.title: Lagta hai aap bahut kuch seh rahe hain.
